meanings.sent1: The suety pie had a rich and fatty taste.
meanings.sent2: The butcher's hands were suety after handling the meat.
meanings.sent3: The suety candle melted quickly, creating a greasy mess.
meanings.sent4: The suety clouds hung low in the sky, heavy with moisture.
meanings.sent5: The suety texture of the dough made it difficult to work with.

meanings.sent1: The suety bird feeder attracted many hungry birds.
meanings.sent2: The suety roof of the barn glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The suety cat left greasy paw prints all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The suety walls of the cave seemed to drip with fat.
meanings.sent5: The suety appearance of the dish made it unappetizing to some.
